Talks.Title: Functional Programming in JavaScript
Talks.Description: With the use of a few simple JS libraries, we can create a full implementation of the Functional Programming paradigm without much effort

Talks.Title: Hacking C#: Development For the Truly Lazy
Talks.Description: How can we achieve our development goals using as little effort as possible? How to be productive, but lazy, using Functional progamming, Linq and MetaProgramming

Talks.Title: Functional Programming in C#
Talks.Description: A look at how we might implement the functional programming paradigm using C# language features that date back as far as C# 4.

Talks.Title: Win at Games and Write Novels With Machine Learning Algorithms
Talks.Description: How we can use a simple machine learning technique and a bit of C# to win at various board games and generate whole new books "by" Jane Austen.

Talks.Title: Steganography - The data that's hidden right under your 6e6f7365
Talks.Description: Steganography - The data that's hidden right under your 6e6f7365

Talks.Title: Down the Oregon Trail with Functional C#
Talks.Description: A worked example of a complete Functional C# application, ported from an legendary, old 1975 game called Oregon Trail.
